channel.title: sandwich on cPanel's Favorite Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in sandwich on cPanel's Favorite Recipes

item.title: Banh Mi
item.description: This banh mi (Vietnamese sandwich) is made with chicken and full of pickled vegetables. My husband works around a lot of Vietnamese restaurants, and I was making him bring me home these tasty sandwiches.

item.title: Grilled Chicken Salad Sandwich
item.description: This is a great way to use leftover grilled chicken breasts from dinner the night before. I like it on wheat. My husband likes it on sourdough.

item.title: Spicy Grilled Cheese Sandwich
item.description: Grilled cheese with onions, tomatoes and jalapenos– tastier than the original!
